step_of_the_day.title: Be kind to someone in your life today (Pillar # 2)
step_of_the_day.content:
These are difficult and stressful times with considerable uncertainty. Yesterday I emphasized the importance of
        being kind to yourself while also being kind to others. Let’s focus on being kind to others today. And start
        with those closest to you. In particular, the people you are isolating with – in most cases this is family.
        Living in close quarters with limited diversions can be like a slow water torture. You might be making the best
        of the situation and trying to accommodate but living and working on top of each other can challenge any
        relationship.

action_step:
Today, hold the intention to show kindness to the others in your environment. Make sure to smile when you see
        them and say something nice. Let them know that you appreciate any accommodation they have been making to
        support your needs and ask if there is anything you can do to support them.
journal_entry:
Write about how your primary relationships have been going. Make note of any unfinished business that needs to
        be addressed.
